definition: (interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

sentences.english: The lap-dog knew many tricks, and was a great favourite with his master.
sentences.chinese: 哈巴狗卻會很多的鬼把戲，深得主人的寵愛。

sentences.english: ANAK was accused of being "the lapdog of President Clough".
sentences.chinese: 阿納協會因成爲“校長克勞夫的哈巴狗”而受到指責。

sentences.english: The tub is for the pug.
It looks like a Pekingese puppy.
sentences.chinese: 看起來像是一隻小哈巴狗啊。

sentences.english: Van Gogh left the perfect spot for a pug puppy to stretch out for a spring nap.
sentences.chinese: 凡高留下了哈巴狗小狗的完美地點小睡的伸展出一春。

sentences.english: I’m going to get a bulldog.

definition: dog's leg/fig. one who follows a villain/henchman/hired thug
bowed head and ears glued (idiom); docile and obedient/at sb's beck and call
servile and bending the knee (idiom); fawning/bending and scraping to curry favor
to curry favor by showing obeisance (idiom)
arrogant appearance/smug appearance/to act condescending/to put on airs
a dog threatens based on master's power (idiom); to use one's position to bully others
native dog/mole cricket (colloquial word for agricultural pest Gryllotalpa 螻蛄|蝼蛄[lou2 gu1])
